title: 1730: The Eight Most Overrated Exercises
description:
In this episode Sal, Adam & Justin reveal eight exercises that should not be your first choice when higher value exercises are available.

  • How every exercise has its value if applied PROPERLY. (2:17)
  • The Eight Most Overrated Exercises.
  • #1 – Burpees. (4:38)
  • #2 – Hip abduction/adduction machine. (7:48)
  • #3 – Planks. (11:51)
  • #4 – Leg extension. (15:21)
  • #5 – Peck deck. (20:31)
  • #6 – Combo exercises. (22:33)
  • #7 – Donkey kickbacks. (29:20)
  • #8 – Tricep kickbacks. (32:36)
  • Honorable mentions. (34:43)

Related Links/Products Mentioned

  • January Promotion (#1): NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS SPECIAL BUNDLE OFFERS
  • January Promotion (#2): MAPS Anabolic 50% off **Code “JANUARY50” at checkout**
  • Visit Chili Sleep for an exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners!

  • How to do a PROPER Plank – Mind Pump TV
